name: Shooting!Block
description:
A small game made with KorokEngine. It took me serval weeks to design/code/test and finally shipped the MAC version.  

How to Play: 

Press 'Arrow Up' key to shoot, hitting the target will get 1 score.

Windows version is on the way, and I'll port it to iOS/Android too.  The game is not free, I know that, I have written a game engine  and other games for free, I need some income to make a living.  I set the price as 1$, it's not too high for most people, I think.
